citeinfo.origin: Far Eastern Hydrometeorlogical Institute, Pacific Fisheries Research Center (TINRO-Center)
citeinfo.title: Database for Plotnikovis Method of Ice Forecasting

descript.abstract: 10-day mean drifting ice boundary in the western part of the Bering Sea. One of predictors for Plotnikovis statistic method of ice forecasting. Information derived from charts of Russian air observations.
descript.purpose: Ice forecasting for the next month.
